snippet: Goats, ponies, monkeys, dogs, sheep, rats, roosters, rabbits and cats have all been known to be companions of thoroughbreds throughout the nation. But at Churchill Downs, it is the cats who serve as ambassadors and companions for the humans who...
abstract: Goats, ponies, monkeys, dogs, sheep, rats, roosters, rabbits and cats have all been known to be companions of thoroughbreds throughout the nation. But at Churchill Downs, it is the cats who serve as ambassadors and companions for the humans who sometimes need a friend.

headline.main: After the Crowds Leave the Track, Who Keeps You Company?
